title: New Customer-specific Pooling Aggregation Report
description:
Description
1. Epic Description
Epic (Requirement and Scope) 
To win the deal with a new customer, we need to support IoT business by delivering a customer-specific Pooling Aggregation report. This report will be built based on a custom logic required by the client: using CUSTOM field of the SIM Cards, they should be aggregated in the specific logic.
The report will aggregate values based on a specific field to enable customer-specific analysis. It will help the client make data-driven decisions by consolidating and structuring key metrics according to their requirements.
New Feature:
Customer-specific report for Bosch: POOLING_AGGREGATION_REPORT
WEB-interface only
Logic with grouping based on CUSTOM field of the SIM card.
Dynamic Pooling only.
  Benefits:
Increases the chances of securing the customer deal.
Provides tailored insights, improving customer decision-making.
Enhances our reporting capabilities with customer-specific customization.
Specific Deliverables  
New Report Summary is created
Documentation describing the changes in report logic and their impact on business processes, SSV updates.
Acceptance Criteria (conditions which must be satisfied for the Epic to be accepted)
New POOLING_AGGREGATION_REPORT is created in Bosch folder in WEBi interface
It should be possible to download in in CSV format from WEBi.
Out of Scope
ARV export is not required.
Dependencies 
 The mapping in the source system is clear and accessible, and the changes have been approved by a business side.
2. Technical / Solution Design / Compliance
Technical & Solution Design  
The report will get data from TMSP Source system.
Data transformation and aggregation will follow the customer-specific logic, applying business rules as defined in the requirement.
Any necessary ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pipelines will be developed to preprocess and structure the data.
Data will be aggregated based on the specified field for targeted customer analysis.
The report will be generated in BI Dashboard with possibility of CSV downloading.
Access to the report should be only for selected Customer(s) in accordance with the security concept.
Compliance evaluation
TBD
3. NFR (if any)
Non functional requirements
None.
  4. SLA(if any)
Service Level Agreements
Ensuring that report data is delivered within the agreed timeframe.
